snippet: The 51-year-old chief of consumer electronics and games has long been seen as a likely successor to Howard Stringer, who led the company since 2005.
abstract: Sony names Kazuo Hirai as president and chief executive; he had been chief of consumer electronics and games.
lead_paragraph: The 51-year-old chief of consumer electronics and games has long been seen as a likely successor to Howard Stringer, who led the company since 2005.

headline.seo: Sony Names Video Game Executive Kazuo Hirai President
headline.main: Sony Picks Game Chief as President
headline.print_headline: Sony Picks Game Chief As President
